SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DS_VS_CODE) FROM ELEMENTS LEFT JOIN SET_VS_ELEMENT ON DS_VS_CODE = METADATA_IDENTiFY LEFT JOIN SETS ON SETS.DS_CODE = SET_VS_ELEMENT.DS_CODE WHERE DS_VS_TYPE = 0 AND (ELEMENTS.METADATA_IDENTIFY=#{keyword} or ELEMENTS.METADATA_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND SETS.ID = #{datasetID}
